name: Returns: Customer Service
description: Running the Customer Service Department has never been so thrilling. As a member of the Super Saver Club family, your job is to process return items from all of our lovely (and honest) customers. Through examining the items and comparing them with customer receipts, learn if the returns are valid or not. Don't worry. It's not like your financial stability (or life) depends on this. Returns: Customer Service!  Meet new people, learn more about our exciting product line, and make sure Joe Mamma doesn't come for you!
